name: UNIQUENESS
description:
HERES HOW IT WORKS:

WHEN ITS YOUR TURN, YOU MUST TRY AND FIND A DIFFERENT RULESET THAT STILL WORKS WITH THE LEVELS IN THE GAME

AFTERWARDS, I ADD A LEVEL THAT PREVENTS YOUR RULESET FROM WORKING

THIS GOES BACK AND FORTH INDEFINITELY UNTIL EITHER YOU CANT FIND A RULESET OR I CANT MAKE A LEVEL

SOME CLARIFICATIONS:

SUBMITTING MULTIPLE RULESETS BEFORE I MAKE THE LEVEL WILL CAUSE ME TO ELIMINATE ALL OF THEM AT ONCE

I CANT CHANGE OR REORDER THE LEVELS

I CAN ADD NEW OBJECTS, BUT PREVIOUS LEVELS MUST STAY THE SAME

I CAN ALSO CHANGE MY RULESET, BUT I WILL ONLY DO THAT AS A LAST RESORT

I AM NOT MERGING THE RULESETS, THEY ARE BEING TESTED SEPERATELY

GOOD LUCK!
